title: Competition Rules

meta.title: Competition Rules | Pull-Up Club
meta.description: Official rules for the Battle Bunker Pull-Up Club competition. Read the guidelines for video submission, pull-up standards, and judging criteria.

subtitle: Complete guidelines for participating in the Battle Bunker Pull-Up Club monthly challenge

whatIs.title: What Is Pull-Up Club?
whatIs.description: Pull-Up Club is a monthly global leaderboard and challenge. You join, submit your strict pull-ups, earn your patch, earn $1 for every rep, and get ranked. Simple. No BS — just clean reps and community.

step1.title: Join
step1.description: $9.99/month. First Month Free. Unlock your first patch. Receive a new patch every 3 months while active.

step2.title: Record Your Reps
step2.description: Submit your unbroken video. Must be posted publicly on IG, YT, FB or TikTok. Tag @battlebunkerpullupclub. Submit at: www.pullupclub.com/profile

step3.title: Get Verified
step3.description: Head judge Shannon manually reviews all reps. If your submission is rejected, you'll receive a follow-up email explaining why. You may then re-record and re-submit your video at any time.

requirements.title: Form Requirements
requirements.grip: Grip: Overhand grip only — no underhand (chin-ups) or neutral grips
requirements.chin: Chin: Must clearly break the horizontal plane of the bar
requirements.lockout: Lockout: Full elbow lockout at the bottom of each rep
requirements.form: Form: No kipping, swinging, or obvious momentum
requirements.speed: Speed: Touch-and-go is okay if every rep meets standards
requirements.feet: Feet: Any position is fine, as long as you're not cheating the movement

notAllowed.title: NOT Allowed
notAllowed.description: Lifting straps or any equipment that touches or wraps around the bar

allowed.title: Allowed
allowed.description: Chalk, gloves, wrist wraps, lifting belts

videoSubmission.title: Video Submission Rules
videoSubmission.fullBody: Full-body view required (from dead hang to top of each rep)
videoSubmission.unbroken: Video must be unbroken - no cuts, edits, or time skips
videoSubmission.deadHang: Must show your first rep starting from a dead hang
videoSubmission.straightBar: Bar must be straight (no angled grips, half bars, or multi-grips)
videoSubmission.chinVisible: We must clearly see your chin cross the top of the bar
videoSubmission.publicUpload: Upload publicly on social (not private or unlisted)
videoSubmission.tagRequired: Must tag @battlebunkerpullupclub in the caption or video

pucBank.title: PUC Bank
pucBank.description: Each week, the PUC Bank is stocked with $250, replenished weekly. Every verified rep earns you $1. If you submit 20 reps, and we verify 20 reps, you'll receive $20
pucBank.payoutInfo: Payouts are awarded to everyone with verified reps, while the PUC bank is still active. All payouts are delivered to your PUC Bank account at the end of each month

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard Rules
leaderboard.resubmitAllowed: If rejected, you may resubmit at any time
leaderboard.onePerMonth: Only 1 approved entry per month is allowed
leaderboard.monthlyFeature: Monthly top rep gets featured on socials and may earn an additional cash payout

rejections.title: Top Reasons for Rejections
rejections.chin: Chin doesn't clearly cross the bar
rejections.lockout: Arms don't fully lock out at the bottom
rejections.momentum: You use momentum, swinging, or kipping
rejections.videoQuality: Your video is unclear, edited, or private
rejections.tagging: You fail to tag us or follow format

support.title: Support
support.description: Need help or want to challenge a ruling?

conclusion: By submitting your video, you acknowledge and accept these rules in full. We reserve the right to deny any submission that does not clearly meet these standards.
